Containers.Name: Socials
Containers.Description: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Description[/span][/u][/b][br] Socials is an a website similar to tappy.tech but open source. Your url is http://exemple.com/(user) where user.json is the file containing the info. There is mine running at socials.dkil.ca[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/app/people[/b] This is where the json files containing someone's socials will be stored. You can see the layout and info on github[br]
Containers.Overview: Socials is an a website similar to tappy.tech but open source. Your url is http://exemple.com/(user) where user.json is the file containing the info.
